mapper.select: SELECT blog.id, blog.user_id, blog.title, blog.content, blog.create_time, user.username FROM blog JOIN user ON blog.user_id = user.id ORDER BY create_time DESC;

SELECT blog.id, blog.user_id, blog.title, blog.content, blog.create_time, user.username FROM blog JOIN user ON blog.user_id = user.id
AND blog.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
AND blog.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%')
AND user.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{username}, '%')
AND blog.create_time >= #{startTime}
AND blog.create_time <= #{endTime}
ORDER BY blog.create_time DESC
SELECT blog.id, blog.user_id, blog.title, blog.content, blog.create_time, user.username FROM blog JOIN user ON blog.user_id = user.id ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT #{limit}
SELECT user.id, user.username, user.password, user.image, user.create_time, user.self_intro FROM blog JOIN user ON blog.user_id = user.id WHERE blog.id = #{id}
